com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.parser.sql

Class DSMSQLStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.parser.sql.DSMSQLStatement

  • public class DSMSQLStatement
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information pertaining to a single DSM rule statement. Each statement has the following:
    • a type specified as one of the StatementType enum.
    • an identifier that specifies the name of an associated table that is either to be created or assigned to, depending on the type of the statment (clauses are assignments).
    • an sql statement, either table creation or selection (clauses are selections).
    • a set of modifiers that are currently only available for clauses. Modifiers are one of the StatementModifiers.
    • a line number where the statement began.
    Author:
    dawood
